options.option_2: all inbound network connections are blocked by AWS Lambda
options.option_3: all inbound and outbound connections are blocked
options.option_4: outbound connections support only TCP/IP sockets
options.option_5: outbound connections support only SSL sockets

translations.explanation: AWS Lambda blocks all inbound network connections and outbound connections are limited to TCP/IP sockets.

translations.questionText: How is versioning supported with Lambda? (Select two)
translations.explanation: Lambda supports versioning through native support and Aliases, allowing you to manage and track different versions of your Lambda functions.

translations.questionText: What is the difference between Stream-based and AWS Services when enabling Lambda?

options.option_1: streams maintains event source mapping in Lambda
options.option_2: streams maintains event source mapping in event source
options.option_3: streams maintains event source mapping in EC2 instance
options.option_4: streams maintains event source mapping in notification
options.option_5: streams maintains event source mapping in API

translations.explanation: In stream-based event sources, the event source mapping is maintained within Lambda itself, allowing for more direct control over event processing.

translations.questionText: Select two custom origin servers from the following?
translations.explanation: EC2 instances and Elastic Load Balancers can be used as custom origin servers, providing flexibility in serving content and managing traffic.

translations.questionText: What two attributes are only associated with CloudFront private content?
translations.explanation: Signed cookies and signed URLs are specific methods used to control access to private content in CloudFront, allowing restricted access to specific content.

translations.questionText: How are origin servers located within CloudFront (Select two)
translations.explanation: Origin servers in CloudFront are located through DNS requests and are part of the web distribution configuration.

translations.questionText: Where are HTML files sourced from when they are not cached at a CloudFront edge location?
translations.explanation: When HTML files are not cached at a CloudFront edge location, they are retrieved from the origin HTTP server.

translations.questionText: What is the capacity of a single Kinesis shard? (Select two)

options.option_2: 1 MB/sec data input and 2 MB/sec data output
options.option_3: 10 MB/sec data input and 10 MB/sec data output

translations.explanation: A single Kinesis shard can handle 1 MB/sec data input and 2 MB/sec data output, and supports 1000 PUT records per second.

translations.questionText: What Amazon AWS service supports real-time processing of data stream from multiple consumers and replay of records?
translations.explanation: Kinesis data streams is designed to handle real-time data streaming, support multiple consumers, and allow replay of records.

translations.questionText: Your company has asked you to capture and forward a real-time data stream on a massive scale directly to RedShift for analysis with BI tools. What AWS tool is most appropriate that provides the feature set and cost effective?
translations.explanation: Kinesis Firehose is the most cost-effective and feature-rich service for capturing and forwarding real-time data streams to RedShift for BI analysis.

translations.questionText: What feature permits tenants to use a private domain name instead of the domain name that CloudFront assigns to a distribution?
translations.explanation: A CNAME record allows users to map a custom domain name to the CloudFront distribution's assigned domain name.

translations.questionText: What Amazon AWS service is available to guarantee the consuming of a unique message only once?
translations.explanation: Amazon SQS (Simple Queue Service) provides mechanisms to ensure that messages are processed exactly once, preventing duplicate message consumption.

translations.questionText: What is the fastest and easiest method for migrating an on-premises VMware virtual machine to the AWS cloud?
translations.explanation: AWS Server Migration Service is specifically designed to simplify and expedite the migration of VMware virtual machines to AWS cloud.

translations.questionText: Select the stateless protocol from the following?
translations.explanation: HTTP is a stateless protocol, meaning each request is independent and does not retain information from previous requests.

translations.questionText: What are three valid endpoints for an API gateway?
translations.explanation: API Gateway supports Lambda functions, AWS services, and web servers as valid endpoints for routing and managing API requests.

translations.questionText: How is a volume selected (identified) when making an EBS Snapshot?
translations.explanation: When creating an EBS Snapshot, the volume is identified by its unique volume ID, which specifically points to the exact EBS volume to be backed up.

translations.questionText: What deployment service enables tenants to replicate an existing AWS stack?
translations.explanation: CloudFormation is the AWS service that allows users to replicate and deploy existing infrastructure stacks using templates.

translations.questionText: What three services can invoke a Lambda function?
translations.explanation: SNS topics, CloudWatch events, and S3 bucket notifications are common services that can trigger Lambda functions.

translations.questionText: What two services enable automatic polling of a stream for new records only and forward them to an AWS storage service?
translations.explanation: Kinesis and Lambda can work together to automatically poll streams and process new records in real-time.

translations.questionText: Your company is deploying a web site with dynamic content to customers in US, EU and APAC regions of the world. Content will include live streaming videos to customers. SSL certificates are required for security purposes. Select the AWS service delivers all requirements and provides the lowest latency?
translations.explanation: CloudFront is a content delivery network (CDN) that provides low-latency global content delivery, supports SSL, and is ideal for dynamic content and video streaming.

translations.questionText: What are the advantages of Beanstalk? (Select two)

options.option_3: easiest solution for developers to deploy cloud applications

translations.explanation: Beanstalk provides orchestration, deployment abstraction, and is designed to be an easy solution for developers to deploy cloud applications.

translations.questionText: You are a network analyst with JSON scripting experience and asked to select an AWS solution that enables automated deployment of cloud services. The template design would include a nondefault VPC with EC2 instances, ELB, Auto-Scaling and active/active failover. What AWS solution is recommended?
translations.explanation: CloudFormation is the ideal service for creating infrastructure templates that can define complex setups including VPC, EC2, ELB, and Auto-Scaling.

translations.questionText: Select two statements that correctly describe OpsWorks?

options.option_1: Opsworks provides operational and configuration automation
options.option_2: OpsWorks is a lower cost alternative to BeanStalk
options.option_3: OpsWorks is primarily a monitoring service
options.option_4: Chef scripts (recipes) are a key aspect of OpsWorks

translations.explanation: OpsWorks provides operational and configuration automation, and uses Chef scripts (recipes) as a key mechanism for managing infrastructure.

translations.questionText: Your company has developed an IoT application that sends Telemetry data from 100,000 sensors. The sensors send a datapoint of 1 KB at one-minute intervals to a DynamoDB collector for monitoring purposes. What AWS stack would enable you to store data for real-time processing and analytics using BI tools?

options.option_2: Sensors -> Kinesis Stream -> Firehose -> DynamoDB -> S3
options.option_4: Sensors -> Kinesis Data Streams -> Firehose -> RDS

translations.explanation: The AWS IoT -> Firehose -> RedShift stack provides an efficient way to collect sensor data and enable real-time analytics using business intelligence tools.

translations.questionText: What AWS service can create a template of the design and configuration for easier deployment of the application to multiple regions?
translations.explanation: CloudFormation is the AWS service designed to create infrastructure templates that can be easily deployed across multiple regions, allowing for consistent and repeatable infrastructure deployment.

translations.questionText: What statement correctly describes CloudWatch operation within AWS cloud?

options.option_2: log data is stored for 15 days

translations.explanation: CloudWatch allows log data to be stored indefinitely, giving users long-term access to their monitoring and logging information.

translations.questionText: What are two AWS subscriber endpoint services that are supported with SNS?
translations.explanation: SQS (Simple Queue Service) and Lambda are two AWS services that can be used as subscriber endpoints with Amazon SNS (Simple Notification Service).

translations.questionText: What AWS services work in concert to integrate security monitoring and audit within a VPC? (Select three)
translations.explanation: CloudWatch, CloudTrail, and VPC Flow Logs work together to provide comprehensive security monitoring and auditing within a Virtual Private Cloud (VPC).

translations.questionText: What is required for remote management access to your Linux-based instance?
translations.explanation: SSH (Secure Shell) is the standard protocol for secure remote access to Linux-based instances, providing encrypted communication and authentication.

translations.questionText: You are asked to select an AWS solution that will create a log entry anytime a snapshot of an RDS database instance and deletes the original instance. Select the AWS service that would provide that feature?
translations.explanation: CloudTrail provides comprehensive logging of AWS API calls and account activities, including actions related to RDS snapshots and instance management.

translations.questionText: What is required to enable application and operating system generated logs and publish to CloudWatch Logs?
translations.explanation: The CloudWatch Log Agent is necessary to collect and send log files from application and operating system sources to CloudWatch Logs.

translations.questionText: What is the purpose of VPC Flow Logs?

options.option_2: capture IP traffic on network interfaces

translations.explanation: VPC Flow Logs capture information about IP traffic going to and from network interfaces in a VPC, providing detailed network traffic monitoring.

translations.questionText: Select two cloud infrastructure services and/or components included with default CloudWatch monitoring?
translations.explanation: SQS queues and hypervisor metrics are typically included in default CloudWatch monitoring for AWS services.

translations.questionText: What feature enables CloudWatch to manage capacity dynamically for EC2 instances?
translations.explanation: Auto-Scaling allows dynamic management of EC2 instance capacity by automatically adjusting the number of instances based on defined conditions.

translations.questionText: What AWS service is used to monitor tenant remote access and various security errors including authentication retries?
translations.explanation: CloudWatch can monitor and log security-related events, including authentication attempts and access errors.

translations.questionText: How does Amazon AWS isolate metrics from different applications for monitoring, store and reporting purposes?
translations.explanation: Namespaces in CloudWatch allow isolation and organization of metrics from different applications and services.

translations.questionText: What Amazon AWS service provides account transaction monitoring and security audit?
translations.explanation: CloudTrail provides comprehensive logging of AWS API calls, enabling detailed account transaction monitoring and security auditing.

translations.questionText: What two statements correctly describe CloudWatch monitoring of database instances?

options.option_1: metrics are sent automatically from DynamoDB and RDS to CloudWatch
options.option_2: alarms must be configured for DynamoDB and RDS within CloudWatch
options.option_3: metrics are not enabled automatically for DynamoDB and RDS
options.option_4: RDS does not support monitoring of operating system metrics

translations.explanation: Metrics from DynamoDB and RDS are automatically sent to CloudWatch, and users can configure additional alarms for these services.

translations.questionText: What AWS service can send notifications to customer smartphones and mobile applications with attached video and/or alerts?
translations.explanation: Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) can send notifications to mobile devices, including push notifications with alerts and attachments.
